events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated for days, and I'm really worried about the delay.
The reported issue has been identified as a Delivery Delay based on customer messages indicating late shipment and tracking concerns.
The case has been assigned to delivery specialist agent Karen for further investigation and customer communication.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your delayed order. I'm here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status with the courier service in detail?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and it was shipped to 123 Maple Lane, Springfield. I hope this helps to locate the package.
After checking with the courier, your package is delayed due to a logistical issue but is expected to arrive within the next 3 days. We will monitor and keep you updated.
Thanks for the update! I appreciate your quick response and will wait for the delivery in the coming days.
Your order has now been successfully delivered according to the courierâ€™s confirmation. Please let us know if there are any further issues.
Just following up to check if your order arrived in good condition and if you are satisfied with the resolution of your delivery delay.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime for future assistance.
